name: Death Jam
description:
GameDev.TV Game Jam Submission

Waking up in her room to an unfamiliar noise Celia wanders her home searching for an escape.  What she finds along the way is not what she expected

Controls 

WASD to move

E to interact

Mouse click for cutscenes and to enter the door code

  • If you get stuck on the door the passcode is 43 

This is my first ever game jam and the first (complete-ish)  game I've built outside of classes. My main goal is that is works at all! 

With that in mind it's nowhere near perfect but I sure had fun making it! I learned a lot too! 

Hopefully you enjoy the end ;) (Hint Hint)
